message: There's a new startup that just launched called http://startupli.st It's about connecting early adopters to new tech startup companies by allowing the members to follow the startup's activity streams aggregated from their connected social profiles (Twitter, Facebook, RSS, CrunchBase). You can also follow founders and other early adopters, create conversations with them, as well as update your own status (similar to tweet). Submit any news to Startup News for the community to vote up and discuss, while relating it to a startup within StartupList. What are your thoughts on StartupList? Feel free to join, just sign in with Twitter.
